turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I was wondering if you can help me make an order for Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a venti ice green tea.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am closet to the Starbucks on Broadway Avenue in Tyler, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, you are ordering a venti iced green tea to be picked up at the starbucks on broadway avenue in tyler texas, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all I need. Thanks.
